Text:
Please keep seeding.  I have limited bandwidth, and bandwidth isn't reset until friday.  I could be offline till then.

-original poster.
Thankyou for this excellent book in color.Greatly appreciated.

FYI: huge filesize is because each page is a bitmap, albeit of excellent quality. I only noticed this when I couldn't select text in Acrobat; zooming in shows the pixelation.
Apart from that: excellent book. Highly recommended.
